text:
Is there a way to also anchor to a point on a page when a user clicks the submit button?
<https://www.oag.com/stars-copy>
On the above page, when a user enters an airline, I'd like when the page refreshes to anchor back to the table that displays the results
You could do it with some javascript/jQuery

just append to the end of the search so if they search for Air Europa and the URL becomes : <https://www.oag.com/stars-copy?airline_name=air+europa>

Just append the ID of the table to it: <https://www.oag.com/stars-copy?airline_name=air+europa#js-table-one>

Personally, I would replace the table with something like handsontable - <https://handsontable.com/>

Gives you live search functionality - no need to refresh
Especially for hubDB which already returns JSON

I want to open youtube video in popup using HubSpot CTA (edited)
anyone have solution for this
